document.full_text: the company said it had added 3.3 million subscribers in the united states in three months, its fastest rate of growth yet, but cautioned that its pace may slow in the months ahead.
document.title: netflix's profit rises amid a rush to on-demand
lines_and_colors: the company said it had added 3.3 million subscribers in the united states in three months, its fastest rate of growth yet, but cautioned that its pace may slow in the months ahead.
